attributes.action: ANSWER THE QUESTIONS POSED ABOUT THE SMITH INSTITUTE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to ensure that all questions asked by Paul Staines/Guido Fawkes pertaining to the Smith Institute are properly answered so that we the electorate may know the complete truth about the Institute's relationship with the Chancellor, Gordon Brown and No 11. Downing St.
